title: Provide Islamic love letter templates and default letter text in Bahasa Indonesia

requirements.text: Translate the Islamic love letter template library into Bahasa Indonesia by updating `frontend/src/content/islamicLetterTemplates.ts` so that each template’s `title` and `content` are written in natural, respectful Indonesian while preserving Islamic references (e.g., Bismillah, Quran verse citations, and hadith references).

quotes: can you make the letter in bahasa indonesia

acceptanceCriteria: All entries in `islamicLetterTemplates` have Indonesian `title` and Indonesian `content` text (no remaining English sentences in the template bodies).
Quran/hadith references remain present and correctly cited (e.g., Surah/ayah references like Quran 30:21, 2:187 are still included).
Selecting any template in the UI loads the Indonesian content into the letter editor and preview as expected.

requirements.text: Update the Letter section defaults and placeholders to Bahasa Indonesia in `frontend/src/components/valentine/LetterSection.tsx`, including the fallback `displayFrom` value, the fallback `finalLetterText`, the textarea placeholder, and the sign-off line shown above the sender name, so that the letter experience is consistently Indonesian even before a template is selected.

quotes: can you make the letter in bahasa indonesia

acceptanceCriteria: When `fromName` is empty, the displayed sender fallback is in Indonesian.
When `letterText` is empty, the preview shows an Indonesian fallback prompt instead of English.
The textarea placeholder text is Indonesian.
The sign-off line (currently “With love,”) is Indonesian.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend.immutablePaths` listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; only compose existing UI components.
Keep the existing single-page flow and editable letter behavior intact; only change language of the letter templates and letter-related defaults/placeholders.
nonGoals: Adding a multi-language toggle or internationalization framework.
Translating the entire application UI outside of the letter templates and letter-specific defaults/placeholders.
